full_threads.body: closing for now - waiting for custom reply

Hi Janelle,

Sounds great, thanks so much!

We’ll wait to hear from you once you’ve got those images ready.

Just give us a shout when you're set and we’ll take it from there.

Always happy to help if anything else pops up in the meantime.

Hi Allie,

Excellent thanks I will ask for those and come back to you ASAP.

Best regards,

Janelle Ramsay | Manager

Hi Janelle,

Thanks for your message! We'd be happy to set this up for you.

Here’s what we’ll do:
  • Add a new Blog section to your website
  • Include it in your main menu so it’s easy to find
  • Upload the content you've shared

Just one quick thing:
  • Could you please send us the images as downloadable files?
    This helps us keep the quality sharp when we publish the post.

Once we have the images, we’ll get everything live and let you know as soon as it’s done.

Let me know if you need anything else, always happy to help!

Good morning,


Can you please assist me with adding a blog section to our website containing the attached, perhaps adding to the menu too? Happy to go with your suggestion.


We're working with a marketing company to manage our socials and they'll be doing blogs every now and again to help with our SEO.




Best Regards,


Janelle Ramsay | Manager
